title: vEdanaiyurAda
sahitya:
vEdanaiyurAda vAzhvu vENumAnAl manamE nI nAthan muruga nAmam OdinAl pOdumE


anupallavi

  pOdum iduvarai paTTa pADellAm pOdum Edum inimEl iyalAdenai Engum


caraNam    piravip-perum kaDalin karaiyErip-pizhaikka perum shramam Edum paDat-tEvai illai
siriyadOr sAdhanaiyAgum muruga nAmattai dhyAnamE ariyadOr phalanai viraivil aLikkumE
